mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.area_id AS "area.id", a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.agt_type, a.agt_grade, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.master, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, a.primary_person AS "primaryPerson.id", a.deputy_person AS "deputyPerson.id", p.name AS "parent.name", ar.name AS "area.name", ar.parent_ids AS "area.parentIds", pp.name AS "primaryPerson.name", dp.name AS "deputyPerson.name", a.qrcode_path AS "qrcodePath"
LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_area ar ON ar.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER pp ON pp.id = a.primary_person LEFT JOIN SYS_USER dp ON dp.id = a.deputy_person
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_office a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.code

SELECT
FROM sys_office a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.code like '%'||#{code}||'%' '%'+#{code}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%')
AND a.name like '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND a.agt_type = #{agtType}
AND (a.id = #{id} OR a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds}) ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office( id, parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, code, name, sort, type, agt_type, agt_grade, grade, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, useable, primary_person, deputy_person, qrcode_path ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{area.id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{agtType}, #{agtGrade}, '0', #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, '1', #{primaryPerson.id}, #{deputyPerson.id}, #{qrcodePath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_id = #{area.id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, agt_type = #{agtType}, agt_grade = #{agtGrade}, grade = #{grade}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, master = #{master}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, useable=#{useable}, primary_person=#{primaryPerson.id}, deputy_person=#{deputyPerson.id}, qrcode_path = #{qrcodePath} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_office SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')

SELECT
FROM sys_office a
WHERE a.phone = #{phone} AND a.del_flag = 0

SELECT

WHERE a.del_flag = 0 and a.type = 4 ORDER BY a.code
